channel.title: vim on Miro's World
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Miro's World

item.title: Binding DashDoc with editors and Eclipse
item.description: If you use DashDoc (see http://kapeli.com/dash), it can be integrated with editor or Eclipse to allow automatically find selected text in Dash documentation sets: Sublime Text This is easy - there is DashDoc plugin - https://sublime.wbond.net/packages/DashDoc The plugin is OS-X specific, because the DashDoc is Start Package Control (Cmd-Shift-P) select Install Package (type Install) select DashDoc The Ctrl-H does the search Eclipse There is opensource plugin for it at https://github.
